arts.ttl: Villa beat Spurs to leapfrog Man City into fifth place
arts.sum: Konsa opened the scoring just before the hour mark at Villa Park, getting his second league goal of the season with a first-time finish. Villa will hope another victory against Man Utd at Old Trafford on the final day is enough to secure a second successive Champions League campaign.

arts.ttl: In-form Aston Villa close on Champions League return with Tottenham victory
arts.sum: Ezri Konsa and Boubacar Kamara scored in the second half for the hosts.

arts.sum: Aston Villa will be bidding to break a club record when they square off against Tottenham Hotspur in the Premier League on Friday night.
